types.test: Use for add a new test feature.
types.fix: Use for fix currently test feature.
types.refactor: Use for code tweaks and improvements (architecture, performance, clean code, etc).
types.build: Use for change build configurations or continuous integration scripts.

scopeDescriptions: Optional, can be anything specifying the scope of the commit change.
For example package, test context, configuration, commands, component, pages, etc.
subjectDescriptions: Brief summary of the change in present tense. Not capitalized. No period at the end.
